repnme.cdata!: Turkey - Third Structural Adjustment Loan Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The basis for the Third Structural
            Adjustment Loan Project includes measures in the following
            areas: (a) macroeconomic policies - domestic resource
            mobilization, export promotion, import liberalization,
            medium-term framework; (b) rationalization of public
            investment; (c) reform of the State Economic Enterprises;
            and (d) policies in the agriculture and energy sectors. The
            loan would finance all imports, except for items financed by
            other sources and luxury, military or paramilitary items and
            nuclear reactors.
